title: Experience
intro: I hold a Higher Education Diploma specializing in Computer Engineering at Mid Sweden University and have previously worked as a developer at Tradera and Avarda. I'm currently focusing on earning my Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering, which I expect to be completed in the spring of 2025.

education.title: Education
education.intro: I have a University Diploma(120 hp) in Computer Engineering. I studied at Mid Sweden University, fully remote.
